name: The Puzzle Story
description:
A company is missing people and using them as lab rats. They are trying to do a IQ booster but this project is fully failure. We were worker of there and one day we're saying enough and story starts at here.



There will be totally 7 different puzzled levels. In some levels you'll need to just figure out the puzzle of the room but in some of rooms you'll need to use your parkour abilities. You'll need to follow the cutscenes to understand what is going on.


  • 7 Different Puzzle Levels
  • Fully Story-Mode Game
  • Cutscenes Supperted Storytelling.
  • Low-Poly designed Art Style.
  • Insane Graphics Qualty.
